mapper.select: select r.review_No AS reviewNo ,r.user_id AS userId ,r.corp_name AS corpName ,r.review_coment AS reviewComment ,k.corp_keyword AS corpKeyword ,w.corp_welfare AS corpWelfare from corp_review r left join corp_keywordList k ON r.review_No = k.review_No left join corp_welfare w ON r.review_No = w.review_No
